lib/hope/variant/variant_storage.h

00008 
00009 #pragma once
00010 
00011 #include <type_traits>
00012 #include <cassert>
00013 #include "hope/typelist/type_list.h"
00014 
00015 namespace hope {
00016 
00017     namespace detail {
00018         template <typename... Ts>
00019         class variant_storage final {
00020         public:
00021             template<typename T>
00022             T& get() {
00023                 check_conditions<T>();
00024                 return reinterpret_cast<T&>(m_storage);
00025             }
00026 
00027             template<typename T>
00028             [[nodiscard]] const T& get() const {
00029                 check_conditions<T>();
00030                 return reinterpret_cast<const T&>(m_storage);
00031             }
00032 
00033             template<typename T, typename... Vs>
00034             void initialize(Vs&&... values) {
00035                 static_assert(contains<T>(Types));
00036                 delete_cur_value();
00037                 update_type_index<T>();
00038                 new(&m_storage) T(std::forward<Vs>(values)...);
00039             }
00040 
00041             template<typename T>
00042             void set(T&& value) {
00043                 if (m_cur_type_index == find<T>(type_list<Ts...>{}))
00044                     get_impl<T>() = std::forward<T>(value);
00045                 else 
00046                     initialize<T>(std::forward<T>(value));
00047             }
00048 
00049         private:
00050 
00051             template <typename T>
00052             T& get_impl() {
00053                 return reinterpret_cast<T&>(m_storage);
00054             }
00055 
00056             template<typename T>
00057             void check_conditions() {
00058                 static_assert(contains<T>(Types));
00059                 assert(is_initialized());
00060             }
00061 
00062             void delete_cur_value() {
00063                 if (is_initialized()) {
00064                     // it seems like vs142 still has some bugs...
00065                     // im sure it should works fine
00066                     // (DeactivateImpl<Ts>, ...);
00067 
00068                     // Old style curly braces
00069                     const bool bs[] = { deactivate_impl<Ts>()... };
00070                     (void)bs;
00071                 }
00072             }
00073 
00074             template <typename T>
00075             constexpr bool deactivate_impl() {
00076                 if (m_cur_type_index == find<T>(Types)) {
00077                     reinterpret_cast<T*>(&m_storage)->~T();
00078                     m_cur_type_index = TypesCount;
00079                 }
00080                 return { };
00081             }
00082 
00083             template <typename T>
00084             constexpr void update_type_index() {
00085                 m_cur_type_index = find<T>(Types);
00086             }
00087 
00088             [[nodiscard]] bool is_initialized() const {
00089                 return m_cur_type_index < TypesCount;
00090             }
00091 
00092             constexpr static type_list<Ts...>   Types{ };
00093             constexpr static size_t             LargestTypeIdx{ largest_type_index(type_list<Ts...>{}) };
00094             constexpr static size_t             TypesCount = size(Types);
00095 
00096             using largest_t = typename decltype(largest_type(type_list<Ts...>{}))::Type;
00097             using storage_t = std::aligned_storage_t<sizeof(largest_t), alignof(largest_t)>;
00098 
00099             storage_t       m_storage{ };
00100             std::size_t     m_cur_type_index{ size(type_list<Ts...>{}) };
00101         };
00102     }
00103 }
